Key Match Events: Astros took advantage of two Kansas City errors in a four-run eighth inning to beat the Royals 6-3.
Astros third baseman Alex Bregman was ejected in the fourth inning after appearing to complain about a strike-three call from home plate umpire Alex Tosi.
Pre-Game Insights: Veteran outfielder Jason Heyward made a splash in his Astros debut after being released by the Dodgers and signing with Houston earlier this week.
Post-Match Reflections: Royals shortstop Bobby Witt Jr., who leads the American League in hits, batting average and runs, went 0 for 4 after hitting safely in 16 of his previous 17 games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Astros starter Hunter Brown — pitching on his 26th birthday — allowed two hits and no earned runs while striking out four and walking one in 6 2/3 innings.
Royals RHP Seth Lugo (14-8, 3.19 ERA) will start against Astros LHP Framber Valdez (13-6, 3.27) on Friday
